game.name: Scary Run
game.description:
Oh no! This cute and little boy has suddenly found himself in a scary place. He screamed and spotted you there for help. Would you like to guide him to escape on a spooky alien planet? Join Scary Run and be prepared to help this little boy run and jump his way to safety! Be careful and try to alert all the time as the entire running track is full of multiple obstacles in this brand new adventure game!

The only way to save his life is to run continuously. Make sure to avoid the silly monsters and blood-thirsty zombies. You would also be stopped by the flying crows and other obstacles in the air so do not forget to dodge them timely to make him through this thrilling and exciting adventure. A dangerous skeleton will keep chasing your boy all the time so you cannot take your fingers off for a second.

Keep jumping all the scary zombies, monsters, stones and birds to complete each level of this cool HTML5 running game! Try to keep your boy away from all the skulls that are willingly interested to catch you! Grab as much coins as you can to upgrade your characters to make your game more interesting! It is up to you how this boy will survive for long so challenge your intense escaping skills to get the job done. Good luck to reach the longer distance and secure a top position in the leaderboard with the highest possible score!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Scary Run at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
